what_you_do: Master connector, entrepreneur, and networking expert who helps business owners grow through authentic relationships and strategic partnerships.
who_you_serve: Entrepreneurs and business owners, particularly those just getting started building their online business.
social_proof: Talked to over 3,000 entrepreneurs; achieved first 6-figure year; went from stranger to major connector in Groton, Connecticut in one year; host of three podcasts.
signature_programs: The Guy Who Knows a Guy (book), Nine Foundational Questions of Business (framework/book), JV Connect (flagship event), Morning Motivation Podcast, The Guy Who Knows a Guy Podcast, Neurodiversity Superpowers Podcast
business_focus: Helping entrepreneurs build authentic relationships and strategic partnerships to grow their businesses without cold outreach or high-pressure tactics.
service_provided: Networking concierge, one-on-one coaching, masterminds, live events, talks and workshops, podcast hosting
